properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 2 at 12:34PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Mississippi River...
Mississippi River at Osceola affecting Mississippi...Lauderdale
and Tipton Counties

The Flood Advisory continues for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* until further notice.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 20.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to rise through the weekend,
with a flat crest near 28.0 feet early next week.
* At 29.0 feet...In Arkansas, water is going over the north side of
Craighead Point. Pumphouse area for the power plant south of
Osceola is flooded. In Tennessee, Lauderdale County Road 924 begins
to flood, isolating a house on Island 34.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
